name: Dynamite Duchess 3: Carnival of Souls
summary: Explore Heaven, Hell, and Purgatory (and invade a few of your friends' heavenly suites) on a quest to save your mother's soul. Fight weird monsters, talk to annoying NPCs, and solve a few vexing puzzles.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Doom 2-Dynamite Duchess 3 Carnival Of Lost Souls Single-Player Modification
